There are three basic stages in installing a PentOS platform.

  1. Install Base Operating System
    • Red Hat 7
    • CentOS 7
    • Fedora 26
  2. Install PentOS Security Tools
    • PentOS Security Tools
  3. Install Optional Components
    • PentOS Wiki Portable PentOS Wiki
    • PentOS SDR PentOS Wireless/SDR

Some basic functionality of the PentOS platform can be validated by running throught the Metasploitable 2 walkthrough
